help.title: Help & Support
help.contactDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Reach out to our support team.
help.reportBugDescription: Found something that isn't working right? Let us know so we can fix it.
help.buildWith: Built with care by Digital Green

addCow.question: How do I add a cow?
addCow.answer: Go to the "My Cows" section from the home page or bottom navigation, then tap the "+" button. Fill in the cow's details such as name, breed, weight, and milk production, then tap Save.

logMilk.question: How do I log milk production?
logMilk.answer: Navigate to "Milk Logs" from the bottom navigation, tap the "+" button, select a cow, enter the morning and/or evening milk yield in liters, and save the entry.

dietOptimizer.question: How does the diet optimizer work?
dietOptimizer.answer: The diet optimizer uses your cow's weight, milk production, and available feeds to calculate the most cost-effective or highest-yield diet. Go to "Diet Plans", create a new plan, select a cow and available feeds, choose your optimization goal, and the system will generate a recommended diet.

offlineUse.question: Can I use the app offline?
offlineUse.answer: Yes! You can view your cows, milk logs, and diet plans while offline. Any changes you make will be saved locally and automatically synced when you reconnect to the internet. Diet optimization requires an internet connection.

changeLanguage.question: How do I change my language?
changeLanguage.answer: Go to Settings and tap on "Language". Select your preferred language from the list. The app supports over 20 languages across multiple regions.

dataSync.question: How do I sync my data?
dataSync.answer: Your data syncs automatically when you are connected to the internet. You can also manually trigger a sync from Settings under "Data & Sync" by tapping the sync button.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.dataCollectionDesc: We collect the following information to provide and improve our services:

dataCollected.name: Name and profile information
dataCollected.cowData: Cow details (breed, weight, age, lactation stage)

privacy.dataUsageDesc: Your data is used for the following purposes:

dataUsageItems.dietOptimization: Generating optimized diet plans for your cattle
dataUsageItems.reporting: Producing milk yield and farming reports
dataUsageItems.farmingInsights: Providing insights to improve farming practices

privacy.dataStorageDesc: Your data is stored on secure, encrypted servers. Local data on your device is also encrypted. We use industry-standard security measures to protect your information.
privacy.dataSharingDesc: We do not share your personal data with third parties without your explicit consent. Aggregated, anonymized data may be used for research purposes to improve agricultural practices.
privacy.yourRightsDesc: You have the following rights regarding your data:

rightsItems.access: Access your personal data at any time
rightsItems.delete: Request deletion of your account and data
